title: Vanity Fair - the effect of the last paragraph

content.question: Which of the following best describes the effect of the last paragraph?

choices.label: It illustrates how Sir Pitt's political and family affairs reflect his character.
It shows how Sir Pitt's shortcomings are beneficial to his political career.
It introduces Miss Sharp's role as an observer of Sir Pitt's actions.
It suggests the causes of Sir Pitt's moral transformation.

content.answer: It illustrates how Sir Pitt's political and family affairs reflect his character.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
